Package group10.server.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
group10.server.controller.GameController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/game") public class GameController extends Object
REST Endpoint class for Games. All requests that are sent to /api/game is handled by this class
Author:
Alperen Caykus, Mustafa Ozan Alpay

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      @Autowired public GameController​(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext context, GameService gameService, MatchService matchService, PlayerService playerService)
      Constructor for game controller.
      Parameters:
      context - Autowired application context
      gameService - Autowired game service
      matchService - Autowired match service
      playerService - Autowired player service

  • Method Details

    • getNewGame

      @GetMapping("/new") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getNewGame()
      HTTP GET requests to /new path are served by this method. Gets a new game and logs the username of the player that sent the request.
      Returns:
      HTTP200 New game as response.

    • getOpponent

      @PostMapping("/match") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getOpponent​(@RequestBody MatchMakingDTO playerNetworkInfo)
      HTTP POST requests to /match path are served by this method. Gets the opponent network information for the multiplayer level. If there is no opponent, user is placed into queue.
      Parameters:
      playerNetworkInfo - Server and IP of the player that requested opponent. This parameter is modified inside the method in a way that playerId and userName fields are populated using the token of the user.
      Returns:
      HTTP200 Opponent network information as HTTP response.

    • nextMatch

      @PostMapping("/next") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> nextMatch​(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid MatchDTO dto)
      HTTP POST requests to /next path are served by this method. Logs the username of the user that sent the request to standard out.
      Parameters:
      dto - HTTP Request body that contains level information.
      Returns:
      HTTP200 with next level if request is valid, else HTTP 400 Bad request

    • getScoreboard

      @GetMapping("/scoreboard/{day}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getScoreboard​(@PathVariable int day, @RequestParam(name="pageSize",defaultValue="10") int pageSize, @RequestParam(name="pageNumber",defaultValue="0") int pageNumber)
      HTTP GET requests to /scoreboard/{day} path are served by this method.
      Parameters:
      day - Scoreboard of last 'day' days
      pageSize - Number of score entries to be retrieved
      pageNumber - Page number of wanted scores. Used for paging the data.
      Returns:
      HTTP200 scoreboard

    • getScoreboard

      @GetMapping("/scoreboard/game/{id}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getScoreboard​(@PathVariable long id)
      HTTP GET requests to /scoreboard/game/{id} path are served by this method.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the game
      Returns:
      HTTP200 Scoreboard related to this game
